column4: hi all, Ive just installed ubuntu 5.10 - its found my wireless router and ive provided the relevant details, but i still cant conect to anything and if i try pinging the router i get "DESTINATION HOST UNREACHABLE" - can anyone offer some help with this? All details are correct, thanks
